itunes:title: Episode 534 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/14/20 - Is LSU The Greatest Ever?
title: Episode 534 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/14/20 - Is LSU The Greatest Ever?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the National Championship game between LSU/Clemson and answer the question of whether or not LSU is the single season best college football team of all time, we look ahead to next years CFP and give a sneak peek of...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the National Championship game between LSU/Clemson and answer the question of whether or not LSU is the single season best college football team of all time, we look ahead to next years CFP and give a sneak peek of what is to come, we break down the spreads of the NFC and AFC Championships, and chat about the cheating scandals that have rocked the MLB this week.
